message: Let's split it 50/50 and start fresh!
You can't get 50/50, I'm the one who's willing to make the first move!
You're being a bit too greedy, Bob. Meet me in the middle?
You're getting closer, but I'm not done yet. I'll give you a little more, but not too much!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Don't make me make you an offer you can't refuse
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you get the best of me!
This is my final offer. Take it, or we'll be here all day!
I'm not going to make another offer. This is it. Take it or leave it!
